name: Delivery Time! Downtown
description:
Note: Web Version coming soon. Working on performance Optimizations currently.

Delivery Time Downtown is a puzzle game about using Carvana Power to deliver cars to people to make their lives happier!

Controls:

  • Use the mouse to move the Hauler and the Carvana Power Tokens

Goal:

  • Deliver the Car to the Customer's Address

Movement:  

  1. The Hauler uses Carvana Power Tokens to Move Forward
  2. Carvana Power Tokens can also move just like the Hauler does

Happiness:

  1. Grant 1 Happiness for Delivering The Car
  2. Grant 1 Happiness by Picking Up a Special Gift
  3. Grant 1 Happiness by Collecting Carvana Power
